item.description:
This meeting will be an open build--you can work on whatever project you'd like in the shop.

 

During the first half-hour, I will give a demo on how to create a shape and output it on our Tormach 4-axis mill. For this demonstration we will only use 3-axis.

You won't be an expert on how to use the mill when you leave, but at least you'll know how to get started designing shapes and the basic process of getting the toolpath files to run on the machine.

 

This is a good opportunity to work on your Halloween project.
item.how_to_find_us: At the interesection of Route 2 and 128.
item.name: Open Build plus 3-axis CNC Milling demo
